attributes.action:
Lockdown wales!
We want to save our loved ones from the coronavirus.
attributes.additional_details:
To save lives. No one should have there lives taken before there time! 
U have people fighting cancer to stay alive. But what’s the point when they get the virus they won’t have chance. Help us save the most vulnerable people of our county now
attributes.background: I want wales to be locked down. It can’t hurt to have people on lock down to saves the ones we love. There are a lot of people who are elderly or young with underlining health conditions and this ain’t fair on them!

rejection.details:
The Welsh Government is responsible for decisions such as closing schools and businesses in Wales. Since you started this petition, additional measures have been announced. You can find the latest guidance here: https://gov.wales/topic/980/latest

You may wish to sign one of these petitions if you would like a stricter lock down across the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310805

If you would like specific restrictions in Wales, you can find out who represents you here: https://www.assembly.wales/en/memhome/Pages/memhome.aspx

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:  

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
